summary: Experienced Software Engineer with a demonstrated history of working in retail and outsourcing. Skilled in AWS Services and Architecture, Scala, Akka, Java, Application Programming Interfaces, NoSQL + SQL, and Agil methodologies. Strong engineering professional with a Master's degree focused in Computer Science from Universidad de Costa Rica.

projects.title: Backcountry CRM Tracker (producer)
projects.description:
Description: create a producer by fetching emails from Outlook-Office365 to include email-records inside the CRM.

Tools and Software: Scala with Play Framework, RabbitMQ, Akka Actors, Akka Streams, MongoDB with Reactive Mongo, Kamon, Office365 API

projects.title: Backcountry Marketing Dashboard
projects.description:
Description: create a Dashboard for Marketing Team in order to reflect the cost, revenue and other critical information related with sales and advertising campaigns. That information was extracted from many datasources including: Google Adwords, Bing Adds, Facebook Adds, Adobe Analytics and more. This Dashboard allows Marketing Team them to take critical decisions on Ads Campaigns based on that information (specially for Q4 Black Friday, Cyber Monday and Holiday season).

Tools: Apache Spark, Databicks, Scala 2.11, Python 3.6 , Amazon S3.
